ARABIC: إِن يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَٰثًا وَإِن يَدْعُونَ إِلَّا شَيْطَٰنًا مَّرِيدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What they call on apart from Him are female idols. What they call on is an arrogant shaytan
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In His place they invoke only females (the pagan deities); and instead of Him they invoke Satan the obstinate rebel
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Rather than call upon Him, they call upon goddesses, and call upon a rebellious Satan
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They (the pagans) only worship idols and Satan, the persistent rebel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The polytheists do not worship Allah, except some females; and they do not worship anyone except the rebellious Satan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They invoke nothing but female deities besides Him (Allah), and they invoke nothing but Shaytan, a persistent rebel!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They do not call besides Him on anything but idols, and they do not call on anything but a rebellious Shaitan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: In stead of Him, they pray not except to female beings; they pray not except to a rebel Satan accursed by God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They invoke in His stead only females; they pray to none else than Satan, a rebel
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They [the polytheists] call upon female deities, and they invoke none but Satan, the rebellious one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They invoke beside Him but females, and they invoke not but a Satan rebellious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They invoke none but females besides Him, and invoke none but a froward Satan,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (The Pagans), leaving Him, call but upon female deities: They call but upon satan the persistent rebel!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (all those who worship others than Allah) invoke nothing but female deities besides Him (Allah), and they invoke nothing but Shaitan (Satan), a persistent rebel!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Instead of Him they supplicate to none but females, and indeed they supplicate to none except the rebellious satan,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They invoke in His stead only females. In fact, they invoke none but a rebellious devil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They call upon instead of Him none but female [deities], and they [actually] call upon none but a rebellious Satan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:117] What (in, is [to be understand as] mā, ‘only’) they pray to, [what] the idolaters worship, instead of Him, God, that is, other than Him, are but females, idols with feminine names, such as al-Lāt, al-‘Uzza and Manāt; and they (in, is [to be understand as] mā, ‘only’) only pray to, they [only] worship, by worshipping [these female idols], a rebellious satan, one who has rebelled against obedience [to God], for they are obeying him in this [worship of female idols].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They invoke in His stead) the people of Mecca worship in place of Allah (only females) lifeless idols such as 101 al-Lat, al-'Uzza and Manat; (they pray to) they worship (none else than Satan, a rebel) who is intense in his rebellion
